author: cnbc.com
title: PriceSmart posts 2Q profit
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ PriceSmart Inc. (PSMT) on Thursday reported fiscal second-quarter profit of $14.1 million.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had net income of 47 cents. Earnings, adjusted for pretax expenses, came to 89 cents per share.
The warehouse club operator posted revenue of $839.6 million in the period.
PriceSmart shares have declined nearly 3 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $83.80, a fall of roughly 9 percent in the last 12 months.
